channel.title: RS4Coin
channel.description:
Okay so I go to buy 100M All's good says it should be delivered in 24-48 hours A week has gone by and I've gotten no gold... Then today I go to log onto my account, and it's password has been changed. So I contact their "customer support":
Hello my name is Mark, how may I help you? Thomas: Did you guys hack my account Canownu? I ordered 100M and my password got changed. Mark: wat Thomas: I said you guys hacked my account and I ordered 100M The operator has ended the chat session.
Ok so wth... So I request more support
Hello my name is Mark, how may I help you? Thomas: Could you give me back my account, I spent 2 years making it Mark: we only sell accounts if you want to buy an account look at the section Thomas: I said YOU GUYS HACKED MY ACCOUNT Mark: if you want to buy account our cheapest is $28 Thomas: Do you not understand you people stole my account after I spent $200 here The operator has ended the chat session.
I don't want to buy a damn account give me MY ACCOUNT back
Hello my name is Laura, how may I help you? Thomas: I've recently talked to Mark about my account Thomas: A few weeks ago I ordered 100M fast gold on here and after a few weeks nothing happened Thomas: So now my password is changed Laura: wat are u sayin? Thomas: Could I have my account back? Laura: if u want to buy an account look at the account sell section Thomas: I do not want to buy an account Laura: ? Thomas: I WANT MY ACCOUNT BACK Laura: wat is an account Thomas: A RuneScape account you stole from me called Canownu Laura: goodbye The operator has ended the chat session.
You don't know what the hell an account is and you're a customer support staff for a site that sells accounts??
Hello my name is Mark, how may I help you? Thomas: hi Mark: no plz just buy an account The operator has ended the chat session.
How many times do I have to tell you idiot that I don't need to buy an account I want MY account back
Hello my name is Yee, how may I help you? Thomas: i bought 100M here and it's not delivered and now my account pass is changed... Yee: we can fix it i talked to my partners and they said you should buy a new account at our account sales sectino The operator has ended the chat session.
Your partners are faggots
Hello my name is Laura, how may I help you? Thomas: gimme my account scammer Laura: plz buy a new accoutn The operator has ended the chat session.
NO
Hello my name is Rodney, how may I help you? Thomas: Could you give me my account back? Rodney: wat Thomas: omg it's like the same response from every one of you Rodney: wat The operator has ended the chat session.
Is this guy trolling or something
Hello my name is Mark, how may I help you? Thomas: GIVE ME MY DAMN ACCOUNT BACK OR I'LL DDOS YOUR SITE Mark: ok ok just buy a new account The operator has ended the chat session.
NO
Hello my name is Yee, how may I help you? Thomas: You have THIS CONVERSATION to give me my account back or your sites going down Yee: wat Thomas: You can send me an email if you want to give me my acc back at canownueasy@hotmail.com until then ur site will be off and its ur fault The operator has ended the chat session.
So I ddos their site and then they sent me an email
Hello Thomas, This is a message in regards to your unsatisfied customer service. Please stop crashing our site, we really need it you can have your account back just contact our customer support and they will help you. - RS4Coin
So now it's time to contact support and get my account
Hello my name is Rodney, how may I help you? Thomas: So you've sent me an email about my account can I have it back now Rodney: what type of anemail Thomas: wtf I said can I have my account back The operator has ended the chat session.
WTF??
Hello my name is Mark, how may I help you? Thomas: GIVE ME MY DAMN ACCOUNT BACK THAT'S HOW YOU CAN HELP ME Mark: okey okey fine u can have account Canownu back Mark: we will charge $90 for it discont because was stolen Thomas: FUCK OFF You have ended the chat session.
Ye im definately gonna pay $90 for my own acc
Hello my name is Laura, how may I help you? Thomas: you can suck my dick Laura: please buy one in the account section The operator has ended the chat session.
LOL
Hello my name is Mark, how may I help you? Thomas: could i seriously have the account Canownu back Mark: wat The operator has ended the chat session.
YOU CHINK PIECE OF **** STOP TELLING ME WAT
Hello my name is Thomas, how may I help you? Thomas: don't steal my name fag Thomas: don't steal my name fag The operator has ended the chat session.
Are they trolling me or something wtf is this?
Hello my name is Mark, how may I help you? Thomas: GIVE ME MY ACCOUNT YOU CHINK Mark: wat Thomas: GIVE ME MY DAMN ACCOUNT Thomas: Canownu is the name Mark: plesa buy an accont from the sales section Mark: or by tht acc for $85 plz its discount Thomas: I'M NOT BUYING MY OWN ACCOUNT CUZ U GUYS STOLE IT Thomas: I'm gonna bomb beijing Mark: wat The operator has ended the chat session.
OMG So yeah. That customer support was amazing. Totally solved my problem. They spoke so clear too. What I've learned today: RS4Coin scams People with the name Rodney have IQs of -5 Anybody else ever use RS4Coin?
